mean_cn: n.一部分；份额；分担的责任；  vt.把……分成份额
mean_en: one part of something larger; an amount of food that is large enough for one person; a part of something that is shared with other people
sentence: Every month the couple manage to save a small portion of their salaries.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇每个月都设法从工资里省下一小部分钱。
word_etyma: port部分，分开 + ion名词后缀 → portion一部分
